properties.areaDesc: S of Currituck Beach Light NC to Oregon Inlet NC out to 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 18 at 3:02AM EST until February 22 at 5:00AM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
properties.description:
* WHAT...North winds 20 to 30 kt with gusts up to 35 kt and seas
6 to 9 ft expected.

* WHERE...The coastal waters from Duck to Oregon Inlet.

* WHEN...From 5 AM Wednesday to 5 AM EST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM WEDNESDAY TO 5 AM EST SATURDAY
